name: methyl acetate to generic market for solvent, organic | solvent, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9574/documentation

This activity links methyl acetate, byproduct in the oxidation of butane to the generic market for organic solvents.

The activity starts with the reception of methyl acetate

The activity ends with the production of solvent, organic for the generic market
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: the present inventory is a linking activity, from fraction 1 of naphtha separation process, to the generic product "chemical, organic"
